### Do not edit anything left of the colon! ###
### WiFi ###
ssid:""
password:""
### apn ###
apn:"data.lycamobile.nl"
apn_User:"lmnl"
apn_Pass:"plus"
### api ###
httpapi:"http://jrbubuntu.ddns.net:5000/api/telemetry"
### GSM or WiFi ###
ConnectionMode:WiFi
### Set Pin to sensor (no space after colon!) ###
GSM_RX_PIN:44
GSM_TX_PIN:43
Pin_MQ8:1
DHT_SENSOR_PIN:6
DS18B20_PIN:4
flowSensorPin:5
EC_PIN:2
CurrentPin:8
PH_PIN:3
voltPin:15
SW_420_Pin:18
### Set Frequency measurements (no space after colon!) ###
temperatureAmount:5
phValueAmount:2
humidityAmount:5
ecValueAmount:2
flowRateAmount:1
acsAmount:10
ds18b20Amount:5
h2Amount:5
voltAmount:10
powerAmount:10
### Set calibration factor flowsensor ###
flowSensorCalibration:21.00
SW420Amount:5
### Set mobile number (include plus sign and country code and remove leading 0 of "06"! And again, no space after colon!) ###
mobileNumber:
